chapter.title: Architecture
chapter.para: The following diagram is Util System Demo Architecture.
To constitute Web Application of util-system-demo, plugin util-system, simpleweb-jquery and chart plugin are installed in advance.

listitem.para: System information is gathered using the libraries of util-system.
Information is shown in the jQuery UI Portlet type included in simpleweb-jquery.
A screen easy to see intuitively is provided using charts/graphs of FusionChart Free included in chart.
